description.name: Transformer DC MIG/MAG Welder 250A SUPER 230/400V
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Flexibility of use with a wide range of materials such as : steel, stainless steel and aluminium

  • Input voltage 230V or 400V

  • Regulation knobs for: feed wire speed, intermittent time, spot welding time

  • Portable, fan-cooled, with thermal protection

  • Over-heat warning indicator

  • 4 wheels for easy transportation


Technical Data



  • Input Voltage: 230V/400V

  • Duty Cycle @ 15%: 250A - 26,5V

  • Duty Cycle @ 35%: 163A - 22V

  • Duty Cycle @ 60%: 125A - 20V

  • Duty Cycle @ 100%: 96A - 18,8V

  • Welding Current Range: 80A - 250A ; 18,8V - 26,5V

  • No Load Voltage: up to 42V

  • Gas Type: CO2, Argon, CO2/Argon Mix

  • Voltage Steps: 7

  • Weldable Wire Sizes: 0,8mm - 1,6mm

  • Feeding Speed: 2,5 - 20m/min

  • Welding Plate Thickness: 0,8 - 10mm

  • Input Capacity: 10,4kW

  • Input Fuse: 30A

  • Protection: IP21

  • Insulation Class: H

  • Weight: 37,5kg


Package Contents:



  • MIG Welding Machine

  • MIG Welding Torch with cable and accessories

  • Earth Clamp with cable

  • Welding mask

  • Welding brush & hammer

  • Manual

description.name: Concrete Plate Compactor CNP10/60KG Loncin Engine
description.long_desc:
GEKO CNP10 Compactor Plate is a compact, lighweight and robust plate compactor suitable for professional and DIY use. Used to prepare land for patio laying, extension building, landscaping, etc.


Product Features



  • Four-stroke 6.5 KM Loncin OHV petrol engine

  • Recoil start

  • Sealed belt cover

  • Oil-lubricated

  • Base plate size 500 x 360 mm

  • Compaction depth: 200 mm

  • Compaction force: 10,5 kN


Technical Data



  • Engine Type: 4-Stroke Loncin G200F, Air Cooled

  • Engine Size: 196 cc

  • Drive: Twin V-Belt via centrifugal clutch

  • Centrifugal Force: 10,5 kN

  • Frequency vpm: 5600

  • Compaction Depth: 200 mm

  • Speed: 12 m/min

  • Plate Size: 500 x 360 mm

  • Sound Power Level: 108 dB(A)

  • Total Product Weight: 60 kg


Package Contents:



  • 1x Plate compactor

description.name: Rubber Mat for Compactor Plate CNP10
description.long_desc:
Gumowa mata 370x530x6mm do zagęszczarki.

Charakterystyka:

  • mata o wymiarach: 370x530x6mm – w zestawie śruby montażowe
  • wysoka odporność na ścieranie
  • nie brudzi elementów z którymi jest w kontakcie
  • właściwości tłumiące wstrząsy, uderzania i drgania
  • zwiększona odporność na rozrywanie i pękanie

description.name: Rubber Mat for Compactor Plate CNP90
Electric Concrete Vibrator 1600W dia.38mm 4m Hose
description.long_desc:
High frequency vibrating poker system providing a compact and portable air removal in concrete.


Product Features



  • Robust 2300W motor

  • 260 Hz high frequency for excellent air removal

  • Compact and lightweight construction

  • 36mm poker head with steel reinforcement

  • Comfortable handle

  • On/off switch on handle


Technical Data



  • Power Output: 2200W

  • Input Voltage: 230V, 50Hz

  • Poker Diameter: 38 mm

  • Hose Length: 4 m

description.name: Steel-reinforced Poker for Concrete Vibrator 35mm x 2m
Steel-reinforced Poker for Concrete Vibrator 38mm x 4m
Gasoline Engine 7HP
description.long_desc:
Gasoline four-stroke engine 6.5KM

á

Engine is made of a high quality material. Designed for pumps, compactors,árototillers, power trowels and other devices with a internal combustion drive.

á

Technical data:

Engine capacityá196 ccm
Powerá- 6.5KM
Weightá- cir. 16kg
Rotational speedá- 3600 rpm/min
Crankshaft thicknessá- 20mm
Engineá- gasolineáfour-stroke, air-cooled

description.name: Reversible Compact Drill / Driver LED 230V
description.long_desc:
GEKO Corded Drill / Driver features a 280 Watt motor for powerful drilling into a wide range of materials. 20-position adjustable torque clutch to match countersink depth to material. LED work light can help you work in hard to see spaces. SoftGrip overmold ensures optimum grip and user comfort. Popular in DIY tools market.


Product Features



  • 20-position adjustable torque clutch to match countersink depth to material

  • LED work light

  • SoftGrip overmold ensures optimum grip and user comfort

  • Keyless 3/8" chuck allows quick bit changes

  • Forward/reverse switch

  • Lock-on feature enables continuous drilling operation

  • Easy & quick carbon brush replacement


Technical Data



  • Corded Tool Type: Drill / Driver

  • Power: 280W

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50Hz

  • No Load Speed: 0-750 rpm

  • Torque Setting: 20 Shifts

  • Chuck Type: 3/8-24UNF 0,8-10mm

  • Forward/reverse switch: Yes

  • Protection Class: II

description.name: Jigsaw with Laser Guide 810W
description.long_desc:
810W Jig Saw with Laser Guide.


Product Features



  • 810W Engine Power

  • Built-in laser guide for accurate cutting

  • Base adjustment that bevels at 45 Degree left and right: 0 / 15 / 30 / 45°

  • Tool-less blade change

  • Lock button allows continuous operation and reduces user fatigue

  • Variable speed dial easily adjusts from 0 to 3000 spm

  • Storage for blades in Jig Saw housing

  • 3 orbital settings plus straight cutting to cut a variety of materials

  • Dust remover option (need vacuum cleaner)/li>

Technical Data



  • Engine Power: 810 W

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50 Hz

  • Max Cutting Depth: 80 mm

  • Strokes per minute: 0 - 3 000

  • Bevel Capacity: 45°

  • Protection Class: II

description.name: Reciprocating Saw 900W GEKO
description.long_desc:
Reciprocating Saw with powerful 900W motor. Ideal for cutting wood, metal and plastic.


Product Features



  • Engine Power: 900 W

  • Max Cutting Depth: 115 mm

  • Variable speed trigger: 0 - 2800 spm

  • Tool-less blade change

  • Comfortable ergonomic soft-grip handle

  • Adjustable shoe


Technical Data



  • Engine Power: 900 W

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50 Hz

  • Strokes per minute: 0 - 2800 spm

  • Max Cutting Length: 115 mm

  • Length Of Stroke: 20 mm

  • Protection Class: II

description.name: Wool Polishing Pad 180 mm
description.long_desc:
Wool polishing pad for orbit sanders. Polish surface to a glossy finish without causing scratches or marring the surface.


Product Features



  • 180 mm diameter

  • Extra soft and safe will not damage finish

description.name: GEKO Angle Grinder 125mm 1200W
description.long_desc:
Suitable for cutting and grinding masonry, concrete and steel.


Product Features



  • Powerful 1200W engine

  • Grinding wheel dia. 125 mm

  • Ergonomic soft grip handle

  • Adjustable Handle Position: left / right / top

  • Speed Regulation Dial - 6 Speed

  • Quick-change wheel release

  • Guard allows for 360-degree rotation

  • Aluminium gear housing

  • Durable composite housing

  • Easy carbon brush replacement


Technical Data



  • Engine Power: 1200 W

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50 Hz

  • Variable Speed: 3 000 - 12 000 rpm

  • Grinding Wheel O: 125 mm

  • Arbor: 22 mm

  • Spindle Thread: M14

  • Protection Class: II


Package Contents:



  • angle grinder

  • additional handle

  • guard

  • hex wrench

  • 2pcs carbon brush

description.name: Drill Press 16mm with Vice
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • 250 Watt induction motor develops ample torque and power

  • Multiple Spindle Speeds: 5 speeds

  • Worktable is height adjustable and bevels up to 45 degree left and right

  • Locking linear depth stop with scale

  • Spindle travels up to 50 mm / 2 inch

  • Transparent flip-up chuck safety

  • Drilling capacity 16 mm


Technical Data



  • Moc silnika: 250W

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50Hz

  • Spindle Speeds Range: 580 - 2650 rpm

  • Number of Speeds: 5

  • Chuck Capacity: 3 - 16 mm

  • Spindle Taper: B16

  • Drilling Depth Indicator Scale: 0 - 5 cm

  • Spindle Travel: 50 mm

  • Distance from Spindle Axis to Column Surface: 105 mm

  • Max. Distance from Chuck End to Table Surface: 170 mm

  • Max. Distance from Chuck End to Base Surface: 250 mm

  • Column Diameter: 46 mm

  • Throat: 175 mm

  • Worktable Size: 16 x 16 cm

  • Worktable Tilts: +/- 45°

  • Base Size: 295 x 190 mm

  • Product Height: 575 mm

  • Accessories: machine vice 2.5 inch, key for chuck

description.name: 24L Oil Lubricated Air Compressor 8 bar 210 L/min
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Single stage pump

  • 24 litre receiver capacity

  • 8 bar maximum working pressure

  • Oil sight glass


Technical Data



  • Voltage: 230V

  • Power: 2,5 KM

  • Maximum Delivery: 210 L/min

  • Maximum Air Pressure: 8 bar / 115 psi

  • Tank Capacity: 24L

  • Tank Material: Steel

  • Tank Style: Horizontal

  • Number of Wheels: 2

  • Drive Type: Direct Drive

  • Lubrication Type: Oil

  • Decibel Rating: 91 dB(A)

  • Power: 3,0 KM

  • Maximum Delivery: 410 L/min

  • Maximum Air Pressure: 8 bar / 115 psi

  • Tank Capacity: 50L

  • Tank Material: Steel

  • Tank Style: Horizontal

  • Number of Wheels: 2

  • Lubrication Type: Oil

  • Decibel Rating: 91 dB(A)
description.description:
Product Features



  • Cast iron & aluminium V-Twin cylinder air compressor pump

  • 50 litre receiver capacity

  • 8 bar maximum working pressure

  • Oil sight glass


Technical Data



  • Voltage: 230V

  • Power: 3,0 KM

  • Maximum Delivery: 410 L/min

  • Maximum Air Pressure: 8 bar / 115 psi

  • Tank Capacity: 50L

  • Tank Material: Steel

  • Tank Style: Horizontal

  • Number of Wheels: 2

  • Lubrication Type: Oil

  • Decibel Rating: 91 dB(A)

description.name: Pressure control for air compressors
description.long_desc:
TECHNICAL DATA :

- reduces pressure
- pressure relief valve
- 2 manometers
- header
- max. pressure 12bar
- two European quick connectors
- power supply 230V

description.name: One way switch for air compressors
description.long_desc:
Wyłącznik ciśnieniowy kompresora presostat 12 bar

Presostat powietrza - włącznik / wyłącznik ciśnieniowy kompresora.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Napięcie maksymalne: 240 V
  • Prąd maksymalny: 16 A
  • Ciśnienie maksymalne: 12 bar / 1,2 Mpa / 175 Psi
  • Fabryczny zakres pracy: 5 - 8 bar
  • Możliwość regulacji: 3 - 12 bar
  • Średnica przyłącza: 1/4"
  • Certyfikaty: CE, TUV
